detailsData.title: No Fee Promise
detailsData.content: With the firm's No Fee Until We WinSM policy, clients are assured that they don't owe any fees unless the firm wins or settles their case.

detailsData.title: Focused Expertise
detailsData.content: The firm specializes exclusively in personal injuries from motor vehicle accidents, ensuring a high level of expertise and experience in this area.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Service
detailsData.content: Dedicated to client satisfaction, the firm offers 24/7 availability for consultations and prioritizes clear and consistent communication.

detailsData.title: Proven Track Record
detailsData.content: With over 35 years of experience and hundreds of millions of dollars in recoveries, the firm has a strong history of securing favorable outcomes for their clients.

subHeading: The Largest Motor Vehicle Accident Firm in New York State.
valueProp: At William Mattar Law Offices, we focus on one area of the law — personal injuries from motor vehicle accidents. With over 35 years of experience, our dedicated legal team is committed to helping victims of car accidents get the compensation they deserve. Our firm's No Fee Until We WinSM policy ensures that our clients can seek justice without any upfront costs. We understand the challenges that come after an accident, and we strive to provide compassionate, comprehensive support every step of the way.

testimonalData.text: I have had a great experience at William Mattar law firm. Everyone was very nice and understanding every step of the way. Thank you for such an excellent experience.
testimonalData.author: Javon

testimonalData.text: Just wanted to say thanks to the whole team at William Mattar for being there when I needed them the most, and thanks for helping me through the hard times.
testimonalData.author: Elaine

testimonalData.text: Friendly, called and updated me monthly. Kind caring and kept me in the loop with all the progress on my case. Would definitely use them again in the future.
testimonalData.author: Susan
